org.dejava.component.reflection

Class ClassMirror<Reflected>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dejava.component.reflection.ClassMirror<Reflected>
  • Type Parameters:
    Reflected - The class to be reflected.

    public class ClassMirror<Reflected>
extends Object
    Extends the behavior of the Class type. It is part of an extended Java reflection API, that intends to make reflection easier.

        public ClassMirror(Class<? extends Reflected> reflectedClass)
            throws org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.EmptyParameterException
        Public constructor for the reflection class.
        Parameters:
        reflectedClass - Class being reflected.
        Throws:
        org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.EmptyParameterException - If the reflected class is not given.

      • ClassMirror

        public ClassMirror(String reflectedClassName,
           ClassLoader classLoader,
           Boolean initialize)
            throws org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.InvalidParameterException
        Public constructor for the reflection class.
        Parameters:
        reflectedClassName - Full qualified name of the class being reflected.
        classLoader - Class loader to be used with the reflected class. If no class loader is given, the context class loader is used.
        initialize - Whether the class must be initialized. Default is true.
        Throws:
        org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.InvalidParameterException - If the class cannot be found for the name.

      • ClassMirror

        public ClassMirror(String reflectedClassName)
            throws org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.InvalidParameterException
        Public constructor for the reflection class.
        Parameters:
        reflectedClassName - Full qualified name of the class being reflected.
        Throws:
        org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.InvalidParameterException - If the class cannot be found for the name.

      • ClassMirror

        public ClassMirror(Integer depth)
            throws org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.InvalidParameterException
        Public constructor for the reflection class.
        Parameters:
        depth - Depth in the current stack for the desired class (0 is the first and so on).
        Throws:
        org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.InvalidParameterException - If the class cannot be found for the name or if the depth is greater than the stack trace size.

      • getClass

        public static Class<?> getClass(String className,
                ClassLoader classLoader,
                Boolean initialize)
                         throws org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.InvalidParameterException,
                                org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.EmptyParameterException
        Gets a class with the given name from a given class loader.
        Parameters:
        className - Name of the class to be found.
        classLoader - Class loader to load the class. If no class loader is given, the context class loader is used.
        initialize - Whether the class must be initialized.
        Returns:
        Returns the class with the name.
        Throws:
        org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.EmptyParameterException - If the class name is not given.
        org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.InvalidParameterException - If the class cannot be found for the name.

      • getCurrentClassName

        public static String getCurrentClassName(Integer depth)
                                  throws org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.InvalidParameterException
        Gets the name of the current class (with the selected depth) being executed.
        Parameters:
        depth - Depth in the current stack for the desired class (0 is the first and so on).
        Returns:
        The name of the current class (with the selected depth) being executed.
        Throws:
        org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.InvalidParameterException - If the depth is greater than the stack trace size.

      • getCurrentClass

        public static Class<?> getCurrentClass(Integer depth)

        Gets the current class (with the selected depth) being executed.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The current class (with the selected depth) being executed.
        Throws:
        org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.InvalidParameterException - If the class cannot be found for the name or if the depth is greater than the stack trace size.

      • getSuperclasses

        public Set<ClassMirror<?>> getSuperclasses()
        Gets all the classes and interfaces inherited by the reflected class (including this one).
        Returns:
        All the classes and interfaces inherited by the reflected class (including this one).

      • getFields

        public Collection<FieldMirror> getFields()
        Returns all fields (public or not) from the reflected class (including inherited ones).
        Returns:
        All fields from a class (including inherited ones).

      • getField

        public FieldMirror getField(String fieldName)
                     throws org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.InvalidParameterException,
                            org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.EmptyParameterException
        Returns a field from the reflected class. The search includes the inherited classes. The first field found for the name is returned.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - Name of the field to be found.
        Returns:
        A field from the desired class.
        Throws:
        org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.EmptyParameterException - If the name is not given.
        org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.InvalidParameterException - If the field cannot be found for the name.

      • getFieldPath

        public FieldPath getFieldPath(String fieldNamePath)
        Gets a field path for the reflected class.
        Parameters:
        fieldNamePath - Field path using the desired field names. Using the format: "field1.field2.*.*".
        Returns:
        field path for the reflected class.

      • getPackageAsDirPath

        public String getPackageAsDirPath()
        Gets the class package as a directory path.
        Returns:
        The class package as a directory path.

      • getMethod

        public MethodMirror getMethod(String methodName,
                     Class<?>[] paramsClasses)
                       throws org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.InvalidParameterException,
                              org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.EmptyParameterException
        Gets a method from the reflected class for the given parameters. The search includes the inherited classes and interfaces of each parameter class.
        Parameters:
        methodName - Name of the method to be found.
        paramsClasses - Parameters classes for the method to be found.
        Returns:
        A method from the reflected class for the given parameters.
        Throws:
        org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.EmptyParameterException - If the method name is empty.
        org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.InvalidParameterException - If the method cannot be found or one of the parameters classes is empty.

      • getMethod

        public MethodMirror getMethod(String methodName,
                     Object[] paramsValues)
                       throws org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.InvalidParameterException,
                              org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.EmptyParameterException
        Gets a method from the reflected class for the given parameters. The search includes the inherited classes and interfaces of each parameter class.
        Parameters:
        methodName - Name of the method to be found.
        paramsValues - Parameters values to be used during the method invocation.
        Returns:
        A method from the reflected class for the given parameters.
        Throws:
        org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.EmptyParameterException - If the method name is empty.
        org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.InvalidParameterException - If the method cannot be found or one of the parameters values is empty.

      • getAnnotations

        public Set<AnnotationMirror<?>> getAnnotations()
        Gets all annotations from a class. The search includes super classes and interfaces (but only the first annotation found for a type is kept).
        Returns:
        All annotations form a class.

      • getAnnotation

        public <AnyAnnotation extends Annotation> AnnotationMirror<AnyAnnotation> getAnnotation(Class<AnyAnnotation> annotationClass)
                                                                 throws org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.EmptyParameterException
        Returns an annotation from the reflected class (or its inherited classes and interfaces). The first annotation found for the given class is returned.
        Type Parameters:
        AnyAnnotation - Any annotation being searched.
        Parameters:
        annotationClass - Type of the annotation to be searched for.
        Returns:
        An annotation from the reflected class (or its inherited classes and interfaces).
        Throws:
        org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.EmptyParameterException - If the passed class is null.

      • getConstructor

        public ConstructorMirror<Reflected> getConstructor(Class<?>[] paramsClasses)
                                            throws org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.InvalidParameterException
        Gets a constructor from the reflected class for the given parameters. The search includes the inherited classes and interfaces of each parameter class.
        Parameters:
        paramsClasses - Parameters classes for the constructor to be found.
        Returns:
        A constructor from the reflected class for the given parameters.
        Throws:
        org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.InvalidParameterException - If the constructor cannot be found or one of the parameters classes is empty.

      • getConstructor

        public ConstructorMirror<Reflected> getConstructor(Object[] paramsValues)
                                            throws org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.InvalidParameterException
        Gets a constructor from the reflected class for the given parameters. The search includes the inherited classes and interfaces of each parameter class.
        Parameters:
        paramsValues - Parameters values to be used during the constructor invocation.
        Returns:
        A constructor from the reflected class for the given parameters.
        Throws:
        org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.InvalidParameterException - If the constructor cannot be found or one of the parameters values is empty.
